title: 1.37 David and the Psalms
itunes:title: David and the Psalms
description: I finish my survey of the Book of Psalms. The psalms are replete with references to God as but one member of the pantheon of the ancient Canaanite religion, a god fighting the ancient sea monsters of the Canaanites: Rehab, Leviathan, and Behemoth. Boney M. sings psalm 137.
content:encoded: I finish my survey of the Book of Psalms. The psalms are replete with references to God as but one member of the pantheon of the ancient Canaanite religion, a god fighting the ancient sea monsters of the Canaanites: Rehab, Leviathan, and Behemoth. Boney M. sings psalm 137.
itunes:subtitle: Many of the psalms are rooted in the old Canaanite religion. Boney M. sings psalm 137
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
